I worked on *Scrape the web* among the three options.

## IPCC Emission factor.
What I did is download Emission Factor(EF) data from the Inter goverment Panel of Climate Change (IPCC) EF database (EFDB).
Emission factors are quantitative indicators for Greenhouse gas emissions from specific sources (e.g., land use change and energy, etc.). These are global or regional default values based on scientific experiments.
The EFDB web is: http://www.ipcc-nggip.iges.or.jp/EFDB/
